# matteType

**Instance Property**

The semantic segmentation matte image type.

## Declaration

```swift
var matteType: AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType { get }
```

## Discussion

A semantic segmentation matte’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSemanticSegmentationMatte/matteType-swift.property] is immutable for the life of the object.

## Inspecting a segmentation matte

- **AVSemanticSegmentationMatte.MatteType**: A structure that defines the types of segmentation matte images that you can capture along with the primary image.
- **mattingImage**: The semantic segmentation matte’s internal image.
- **pixelFormatType**: The pixel format type for this object’s internal matting image.
